Question: Seven years this person's senior, Parkes took him on trips and to local cinemas.
Hints: In Los Angeles, Pang encouraged this person to develop regular contact with Julian, whom he had not seen for two years.
This person, hitherto inhibited by Ono in this regard, began to reestablish contact with other relatives and friends.
This person detailed this period in the Beatles' song "The Ballad of John and Yoko".
